node.title: House with window to the stars wins top architectural prize
node.alt: The outside of a stylish house.
node.description: An accessible custom-designed home in the NSW Blue Mountains, whose roof opens to a view of the milky way, wins a top prize as one of the nation's best designed homes — the Robin Boyd Award for Residential Architecture.
node.content:
["For some, a home is their castle. In this case, it's a portal to the galaxy.", "This accessible custom-designed\u00a0home in the NSW Blue Mountains, with a roof opening to a view of the Milky Way, has won a top prize as one of the nation's best-designed homes:\u00a0the Robin Boyd Award for Residential Architecture.", "The brief for the project required that it be accessible for the owner, who uses a wheelchair, but also that it \"take him on an architectural journey\" he would not have embarked upon alone.", "The design is a brick home made from\u00a0recycled, locally sourced\u00a0materials, which offers an easy flow between indoors and outdoors.", "", "
The house centres around a chapel-like room.(Supplied:\u00a0Michael Nicolson)
", "The chapel-like room at its centre is crowned with an elliptical aperture on the roof, allowing the astronomer to stargaze from the comfort of his sitting room.", "The home, designed by Peter Stutchbury Architecture, was named Night Sky.", "", "
Night Sky was made from recycled materials.(Supplied:\u00a0Michael Nicolson)
", "But its design choices \u2014 like a deliberate decision to ignore a northern orientation \u2014 took a while for the prize's judges at the Australian Institute of Architects to dissect.", "They initially viewed its design as \"naive and even under-considered\".", "", "
The home won the Robin Boyd architecural prize.(Supplied:\u00a0Michael Nicolson)
", "But a closer inspection of the attention to detail and adherence to their client's brief led the jury to reconsider.", "\"The potentially deeply problematic choices, deftly orchestrated, develop into a priority that is singular,\" the jury said, noting it fit the client's desire to \"connect with the universe and galaxy\".", "The home is also completely off-grid, generating its own electricity with its power production designed to last at least 120 years.", "", "
The home generates its own electricity.(Supplied:\u00a0Michael Nicolson)
", "For his part, the client said he was happy with the home, in a perspective published on the Australian Institute of Architects website.", "\"I repose in total physical and spiritual communion with my home of multiple vistas,\" he said.", "\"I am content and satisfied in my mountain cabin.\"", "", "
The home was designed with wheelchair accessibility in mind.(Supplied:\u00a0Michael Nicolson)
"]
